definition: excessively conventional and unimaginative and hence dull
details:
adjective
- excessively conventional and unimaginative and hence dull
= example: excessively conventional and unimaginative and hence dull
= synonyms: stuffy
- (used pejoratively) out of fashion
= synonyms: moss-grown, mossy, stick-in-the-mud, fogyish
- heavy and starchy and hard to digest
= example: heavy and starchy and hard to digest
